trans-unit.source: Describes the location and color of a transition point in a gradient.
Use this class to describe the colors in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.

Note that this class does not provide an opacity property; to make a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> semi-transparent, set its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with a transparent <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>.
Freezable Features
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> class with the specified color and offset.
The color value of the gradient stop.
The location in the gradient where the gradient stop is placed.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets the color of the gradient stop.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The color of the gradient stop.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color"></xref> dependency property.
Gets the location of the gradient stop within the gradient vector.
A value of 0.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the beginning of the gradient vector, while a value of 1.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the end of the gradient vector.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The relative location of this gradient stop along the gradient vector.
The default value is 0.0.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset"></xref> dependency property.
Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
A string representation of this object that contains its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset"></xref> values.
Creates a string representation of this object based on the specified culture-specific formatting information.
Culture specific formatting information, or `null` to use the current culture.
A string representation of this object that contains its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset"></xref> values.
Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref href="System.IFormattable"></xref> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
